inclusion.criterion: HCV antibody positive tested at one of six locations in New Orleans: Ozanam Inn, New Orleans Mission, Bethel Colony South, Grace House, St. Anna's Mobile Clinic, and Ruth Fertel
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: vulnerable populations including children, prisoners, pregnant women
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: non-English speaking patients since effective counseling cannot be provided
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is off ETOH for a year and has been diagnosed with hepatic encephalopathy.
